detail_desc: Top in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Narrow, fabric-covered Alice band decorated with plastic beads and a tulle ribbon at each end.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

V-neck jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with ties at the neckline, an opening at the front and a zip at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a high waist with elastication at the back, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print. Drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams with pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and back of the hem.

A-line dress in a cotton weave with small frill trim around the neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and short sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Washed denim jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and ribbed cuffs.
Trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, flap leg pockets with press-studs, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved top in patterned slub jersey with a V-neck and gathers in the sides for a more comfortable fit.
Top in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Gloves in soft leather with a wool-blend lining.
Fully lined, patterned sports bikini. Top with a racer back and opening at the back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide sides.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and wide shoulder straps.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a viscose blend with a soft brushed finish. Deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and short, wide sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt, and a straight-cut skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, zip at the top and kangaroo pocket. Long raglan sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede loafers with soft heel caps and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber soles.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a print motif. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.

Long dress in an airy crêpe weave in a narrow cut at the top with thin shoulder straps. Opening with inset lace at the front, an open back with lace sections and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Bustier in sequined mesh with a V-neck and narrow, elastic shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with fringing at the hem, short sleeves and a print motif on the front.
Top in soft jersey with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Set with a pair of fabric ballet shoes and a matching hairband. Shoes with an elastic strap and bow over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Hairband with a bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Shorts in a viscose and linen weave with wide smocking at the waist and side pockets.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Print motif and reflective details on the legs.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in patterned, stretch organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, a decorative coin pocket at the front and fake back pocket.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 9 cm.
Wide, twill trousers in a wool blend with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide, gently tapered legs. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Soft brushed inside. Size 16x31x39 cm.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Checked jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a seam and wide flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the top. The flounce continues around the back, creating short, flounced sleeves.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from recycled polyester and cotton. Elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets, leg pockets with a taped zip, and tapered legs with cuffed hems.

Boxy, straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck at the back leading to a draped knot detail at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
One-shoulder, fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with elastication at the top and one long sleeve.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery Santa hat on top.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, ribbing around the neckline and a small fabric appliqué just above the hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Sleeveless jersey jumpsuit with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Voluminous skirt in glittery tulle with elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist. Cotton poplin lining.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Mittens in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a sewn-on bow on the uppers, and ribbed cuffs.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with pleats at the top of the shoulders, short sleeves and a box pleat at the back of the neck.
Double-layered hats in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in pleated jersey with short cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges around the sleeves and hems.
Small, sturdy shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top, a magnetic fastener and detachable shoulder strap. Size 9x23x26.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Jacket in woven fabric with a satin shawl collar and welt front pockets. No fasteners. Lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Padded parka in cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Welt chest pocket with a concealed press stud and diagonal front flap pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with elastication and a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a decorative drawstring at the hem. . Pile lining at the top and a lightly padded, quilted lining in the lower section and sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a woven broderie anglaise flounce at the top.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Sandals with a wide foot strap at the front, adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in jacquard-patterned fabric with satin details. Peak lapels in a contrasting colour, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one covered button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and double narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Detachable, narrow tie belt at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
